title: Former Virginia Gov. McDonnell Sentenced To Two Years In Prison
teaser: Former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell will spend two years in federal prison. McDonnell was sentenced on Tuesday. He and his wife were convicted of using the governor's office for favors to businessman Johnnie Williams in exchange for over $170,000 in loans and gifts.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
